mapper.sql: contract_id, contract_firstParty, contract_secondParty, contract_secondPartyId, contract_entryDate, contract_signDate, contract_salaryId
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM oas_contract c LEFT JOIN oas_staff s ON c.contract_secondPartyId = s.staff_id) a LEFT JOIN oas_pay p ON p.pay_id =a.contract_salaryId WHERE a.staff_id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into oas_contract
contract_id,
contract_firstParty,
contract_secondParty,
contract_secondPartyId,
contract_entryDate,
contract_signDate,
contract_salaryId,
contract_content,

mapper.update:
update oas_contract
contract_firstParty = #{contractFirstparty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contract_secondParty = #{contractSecondparty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contract_secondPartyId = #{staff.staffId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
contract_entryDate = #{contractEntrydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
contract_signDate = #{contractSigndate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
contract_salaryId = #{pay.payId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
contract_content = #{contractContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where contract_id = #{contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update oas_contract set contract_firstParty = #{contractFirstparty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_secondParty = #{contractSecondparty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_secondPartyId = #{staff.staffId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, contract_entryDate = #{contractEntrydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, contract_signDate = #{contractSigndate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, contract_salaryId = #{pay.payId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, contract_content = #{contractContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where contract_id = #{contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update oas_contract set contract_firstParty = #{contractFirstparty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_secondParty = #{contractSecondparty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_entryDate = #{contractEntrydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, contract_signDate = #{contractSigndate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, contract_salaryId = #{pay.payId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where contract_secondPartyId = #{staff.staffId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
